channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 会谈取得突破性进展后，中国军方猛烈抨击美国
item.description: China's defence ministry lashed out at the United States on Thursday, a week after their top military officials resumed high-level talks, criticising its continued meddling in the Asia Pacific region and saying it maintained a "Cold War" mindset.翻译:周四，在中美两国高级军事官员恢复高层会谈一周后，中国国防部猛烈抨击美国，批评美国继续干涉亚太地区，并称其保持“冷战”思维。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 因美国降息押注金价攀升至逾三周高位
item.description: Gold prices steadied after hitting a more than three-week high on Thursday, deriving support from a weaker U.S. dollar and lower bond yields as markets bet on rate cuts by the Federal Reserve early next year.翻译:金价在周四触及三周多高位后企稳，因市场押注美联储明年初降息，美元走软和债券收益率下降带来支撑。
item.author: Hissay Bhutia

item.title: 中国计划到2025年建造全球一半以上的清洁燃料船舶
item.description: China has set itself the goal of producing more than half of the world's ships powered by cleaner fuels by 2025, in guidelines published by the industry ministry on Thursday.翻译:工业部周四发布的指导方针中，中国设定了到2025年生产全球一半以上使用清洁燃料的船舶的目标。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 罗纳尔多的阿尔纳斯尔将在亚洲冠军联赛中与沙特队对决
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo's Al-Nassr will face fellow Saudi Pro League side Al-Fayha in the last 16 of the Asian Champions League with four-times winners Al-Hilal due to take on Iran's Sepahan when the continental club championship returns in February.翻译:克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多 (Cristiano Ronaldo) 的阿尔纳赛尔 (Al-Nassr) 将在亚洲冠军联赛 16 强中对阵沙特职业联赛球队阿尔法耶哈 (Al-Fayha)，四届冠军阿尔希拉尔 (Al-Hilal) 将于二月份亚洲俱乐部锦标赛回归时对阵伊朗的塞帕汉 (Sepahan)。
item.author: Michael Church

item.title: 中国表示不会对菲律宾一再“挑衅”视而不见
item.description: China on Thursday said it will not turn a blind eye to repeated "provocations and harassment" by the Philippines, amid heightened tensions over a spate of run-ins in the South China Sea.翻译:中国周四表示，在南海一系列冲突导致紧张局势加剧之际，中国不会对菲律宾一再的“挑衅和骚扰”视而不见。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 中国敦促国民在骚乱中离开缅北地区
item.description: China's embassy in Myanmar urged its nationals on Thursday to leave the Laukkai area in Kokang region in northern Myanmar as soon as possible, citing growing security risks.翻译:中国驻缅甸大使馆周四敦促中国公民尽快离开缅北果敢地区老街地区，理由是安全风险日益增加。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美军加强前沿部署 中国敦促地区保持警惕
item.description: China's defence ministry on Thursday urged the Asia-Pacific to be on high alert as the United States steps up forward military deployment in the region, after reports of a U.S. plan to revive a Pacific airfield that launched atomic bombings of Japan.翻译:在有报道称美国计划恢复对日本发动原子弹轰炸的太平洋机场后，中国国防部周四敦促亚太地区保持高度戒备，因为美国加强了在该地区的军事部署。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 韩国新任国家安全顾问是资深外交官
item.description: South Korea's new national security adviser will be Chang Ho-jin, a seasoned diplomat with extensive experience in U.S. and North Korean affairs, President Yoon Suk Yeol's office said on Thursday.翻译:韩国总统尹锡烈办公室周四表示，韩国新任国家安全顾问将由在美国和朝鲜事务方面拥有丰富经验的经验丰富的外交官张浩镇担任。
item.author: Hyonhee Shin

item.title: 中国谴责台湾“炒作”军事威胁并派遣战机
item.description: China's defence ministry accused Taiwan's government on Thursday of deliberately "hyping up" a military threat from China for electoral gain ahead of elections on the island in just over two weeks' time, but again sent warplanes into the Taiwan Strait.翻译:中国国防部周四指责台湾政府在两周多后的台湾选举前故意“炒作”中国的军事威胁，以获取选举利益，但却再次派战机进入台湾海峡。
item.author: Laurie Chen, Ben Blanchard

item.title: 三名香港活动人士因“恐怖主义”炸弹阴谋被判最高六年监禁
item.description: Three Hong Kong activists were jailed for up to six years on Thursday after pleading guilty to charges relating to a plan to place bombs in court buildings and other public infrastructure in 2021 following widespread pro-democracy protests.翻译:三名香港活动人士周四被判处最高六年监禁，他们承认与 2021 年大规模民主抗议活动后计划在法院大楼和其他公共基础设施放置炸弹有关的指控。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Edward Cho

item.title: 中国小米推出首款电动汽车，计划成为顶级汽车制造商
item.description: Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi took the wraps off its first electric vehicle on Thursday and promptly announced it was aiming to become one of the world's top five automakers.翻译:中国智能手机制造商小米周四揭开了其首款电动汽车的面纱，并立即宣布其目标是成为全球五大汽车制造商之一。
item.author: Yelin Mo, Casey Hall

item.title: 路透调查显示中国12月份工厂活动可能连续第三个月萎缩
item.description: China's manufacturing activity likely contracted for the third consecutive month, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday, weighed by soft demand for manufactured goods, a reading that would embolden calls for more policy support.翻译:路透周四的一项民意调查显示，由于制成品需求疲软，中国制造业活动可能连续第三个月萎缩，这一数据将鼓励更多政策支持的呼声。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 越南“竹子外交”进入加速阶段
item.description: Communist Party-ruled Vietnam has upgraded ties with the world's top powers, including former foes, China and the United States, as part of its "bamboo diplomacy", which it has pro-actively pursued since 2021 to navigate rising global tensions.翻译:共产党统治的越南升级了与世界头号强国的关系，包括前敌人中国和美国，作为其“竹子外交”的一部分，越南自 2021 年以来一直积极推行“竹子外交”，以应对日益加剧的全球紧张局势。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 消息人士称，中国在选举前向台湾有影响力的乐队施压
item.description: Mayday is being pressured to make pro-China comments ahead of elections.翻译:五月天被迫在选举前发表亲中国言论。
item.author: Yimou Lee

item.title: 克林斯曼依靠欧洲球员打破韩国亚洲杯荒
item.description: South Korea coach Juergen Klinsmann will look to captain Son Heung-min and his squad's Europe-based players to steer the nation to their first Asian Cup title in 64 years when he leads his team into next month's continental championship in Qatar.翻译:韩国队主教练于尔根·克林斯曼将带领球队参加下个月在卡塔尔举行的亚洲杯冠军赛，届时他将指望队长孙兴慜和他的欧洲球员带领韩国队夺得 64 年来的首个亚洲杯冠军。
item.author: Michael Church

item.title: 随着降息押注的增加，股价上涨
item.description: World shares gained on Thursday as market wagers on ever-more aggressive interest rate cuts stretched a rally in U.S. stocks and bonds, while the dollar fell to five-month lows.翻译:由于市场对更加激进的降息的押注推动了美国股市和债券的涨势，全球股市周四上涨，而美元跌至五个月低点。
item.author: Tom Wilson, Wayne Cole

item.title: 中国致力于扩大内需，确保经济快速复苏
item.description: China will strive to expand domestic demand, ensure a speedy economic recovery and promote stable growth, according to an interim report on China's 14th five-year plan published by parliament on Wednesday.翻译:全国人大周三公布的“十四五”规划中期报告指出，中国将努力扩大内需，确保经济快速复苏、促进稳定增长。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 比亚迪获得高速路自动驾驶3级有条件测试牌照
item.description: Chinese electric vehicle giant BYD , said on Wednesday it has obtained a conditional testing license for level 3 (L3) autonomous driving on high-speed roads.翻译:中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪周三表示，已获得高速道路 3 级（L3）自动驾驶有条件测试许可证。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国工业利润实现两位数增长但复苏不平衡
item.description: China's November industrial profits posted double-digit gains as overall manufacturing improved, although soft demand continued to constrain business growth expectations, emboldening calls for more macro policy support.翻译:尽管需求疲软继续限制企业增长预期，但随着制造业整体改善，中国 11 月份工业利润录得两位数增长，鼓励更多宏观政策支持。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 预计2024年中国将出现酷暑和更多极端天气
item.description: China - grappling with one of its coldest Decembers on record - will likely have to brace for another round of scorching heat and an increase in extreme weather next year due to the El Nino weather phenomenon, a senior climate expert said.翻译:一位高级气候专家表示，中国正在努力应对有记录以来最冷的12月之一，明年由于厄尔尼诺天气现象，中国可能不得不迎接另一轮酷暑和极端天气的增加。
item.author: Liz Lee
